summary: This is an email chain discussing the drafting of a status memo, referencing content from an FBI 302 interview report. It mentions Jeffrey Epstein's actions during a visit and a victim's refusal of his advances.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced in the context of an FBI 302 report excerpt describing his actions during a visit where he made unwanted advances.

events.title: Epstein's unwanted advance
events.description: During a visit, Epstein used his hand to direct a woman and made an advance which she refused.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated March 6, 2019, discussing the drafting of a status memo.
It references an FBI 302 report excerpt detailing an incident where Jeffrey Epstein made an unwanted advance during a visit.
The victim in the 302 report refused Epstein's advance.
The email discusses the length and legal analysis of the draft status memo, indicating it was being prepared for review by superiors.
